error.ErrorInfo: Please fill the required fields or change the data provided in the fields where it is failing!
error.Select: You must select a value in the select field
error.NonNegative: Number cannot have a negative value
error.AreaFrom: Area from cannot exceed area to
error.FloorFrom: Floor from cannot exceed floor to

Home.Vision: Empower every homeowner, renter and investor to discover, list and secure their ideal property.
Home.LookingProperty: Looking for a property we don't currently have?
Home.LookingPropertyInfo: Provide the details of the property you're searching for and the relevant agencies will contact you if an identical or similar listing becomes available.
Home.YourOffer: Have a property you'd like to offer?
Home.YourOfferInfo: Submit your property details and the relevant agencies will reach out regarding your listing.
Home.Contact: Are you an agency looking to list your properties on our site?

LookingProperty.Intro: Please fill out the form with details about what kind of property you are looking for, and the appropriate agency will contact you if such an offer arises.
LookingProperty.EstateData: Information about what kind of property you are looking for:

YourOffer.Intro: Please fill out the form with the details about your property that you are offering, and the appropriate agency will contact you based on the location of the property.

AboutUs.Intro: Welcome to our real estate platform, where finding or listing a property is no longer a chore but an experience tailored to you. A single destination that brings agencies, homeowners and buyers together under one digital roof.
AboutUs.ExploreListings: Browse an ever-growing catalog of homes, apartments and commercial spaces. Each entry shows category, property type, agency, location, surface area and more. Use powerful filters — by location, price range, square footage to instantly surface matches.
AboutUs.DeepDetails: Click any listing to view high resolution images, agency contact info and an immersive description.
AboutUs.ListYourProperty: Selling or renting? Simply complete our intuitive form with your property's details, upload photos, then confirm your identity via emailed code. With two-factor verification, only legitimate listings make it live.
AboutUs.CustomAlert: Searching for something unique? Tell us what you need — location, layout, budget — and we'll notify you the moment a matching property hits our database. Again, two-factor authentication ensures we're reaching real people with real requests.

Contact.ContactInfo: If you are an agency and you want to upload your estates in our website, feel free to contact us through telephone or email.
